name: Priyte Adventure
description:
-STORY-

Priyte and his friend Hyper went to a factory known as "MeunoMex Facilities." They accidentally wondered into the famous Professor Kogon's private room in which they found out he was trying to resurrect an old evil pirate crew from the past. Priyte noticed he has 3 diamonds shards in total, but there was 9 more out there. If they don't get the rest of the shards before Professor Kogon gets them, then the world would be conquered by the evil pirate crew and the professor himself. Hyper figures they could resurrect an old pirate crew that was good in the past and use them to their advantage against Professor Kogon.

-CONTROLS-

Title Screen/Options - Arrow keys to navigate the menu, press space on an option to proceed.

Main Game - Right or left arrows to move either direction & Z key to jump.

GAMEPAD CONTROLLERS ARE SUPPORTED! THE BUTTONS ARE ALREADY PRESET (to random).

-CREDITS-

Priyte - Team Leader

Hyper Alice - Programmer, Musician

Ale. G/Toei - Sprite Artist/Animator

Google Search - Level backgrounds

PlusNow - Level design idea giver
